tweet: This morning I passed 500 follower milestone. It has dropped again, but whatever.  As a thank you to all you retrograde mofos I figured I should do a giveaway.  3rd place: 10 #LINK 2nd place: 1 #LTC 1st place: 1 #ETH  To enter:   Follow, Retweet, Comment w/ a crypto related .gif
